backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all data types (Evidence, Appeal, WorkSession, LossProfile, CollectiveReport, UserProfile, Testimonial, PaymentConfig, SubscriptionStatus) and integrating blob storage and authorization mixins for the platform.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: financial loss calculator, PDF export functionality, and comprehensive dark mode theme optimized for drivers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including hooks, components, pages, and utilities with notes on stubbed backend methods and type imports from backend-extended.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system featuring warm orange primary and deep navy secondary colors, plus comprehensive dark mode optimized for reduced eye strain during nighttime driving.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Portuguese locale, updated Nova logo favicon references, PWA manifest link, and Google Fonts preloading for Outfit and Inter font families.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest for 'ROTAS E DIREITOS' app with standalone display mode, brand colors, and icon references for 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component configuring TanStack Router with all application routes, QueryClient setup, ThemeProvider defaulting to dark mode, and ProfileSetupModal integration.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminTesti: Admin panel for moderating testimonials with approve/reject actions. Displays pending testimonials with parsed content (quote, name, role) and status badges, handling status updates via mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/MercadoPag: Empty file for MercadoPago setup guide component (no content).
frontend/src/components/admin/PagBankTra: Admin form for configuring PagBank transparent checkout settings including token, email, public key, accepted payment types, installments, and return/webhook URLs with validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/PagBankWeb: Component displaying auto-generated webhook URL with copy functionality and input for return URL configuration. Provides guidance for PagBank webhook registration.
frontend/src/components/AdminGate.tsx: Admin access control component that checks authentication and admin status, displaying appropriate loading states or access denied messages before rendering protected admin content.
frontend/src/components/appeal/AppealEdi: Text editor for reviewing and editing generated appeal text with download as .txt and email sending capabilities. Loads appeal data by ID and platform.
frontend/src/components/appeal/AppealWiz: A form component for generating appeals that collects platform, reason category, user explanation, and evidence IDs, with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/appeal/EvidenceP: A component that displays a list of evidence items from IndexedDB with checkboxes for multi-selection, showing type badges and notes for each item.
frontend/src/components/appeal/SendViaEm: A button component that generates a mailto link for sending appeals via email, with an alert informing users to manually attach evidence files.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main application layout component with responsive header, navigation menu (mobile and desktop), and sidebar containing nav items, account items, and legal links. Includes authentication state handling and admin-specific navigation.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication guard component that displays a login prompt with alert UI when user is not authenticated, otherwise renders children. Provides customizable message prop.
frontend/src/components/collective/Colle: A filter component with three dropdowns for filtering collective reports by platform, region, and reason category.
A form component for anonymously submitting collective reports with platform, region, neighborhood, and reason fields, showing success state after submission.
frontend/src/components/collective/Platf: A bar chart component that visualizes the distribution of collective reports across different platforms using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/collective/Reaso: A pie chart component that displays the distribution of deactivation reasons from collective reports using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/collective/Trend: A line chart component that shows the temporal trend of collective reports aggregated by month using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/evidence/Evidenc: Provides filter dropdowns for evidence type (selfie, screenshot, audio, video) and platform (iFood, Uber, Rappi, 99) with controlled state callbacks.
Displays a toolbar when evidence items are selected, showing count and providing export and clear selection actions.
Renders a filterable timeline of evidence items from IndexedDB with multi-select checkboxes, type/platform badges, and navigation to detail views.
Tabbed form for adding evidence via real-time capture or file upload, with fields for type, platform, region, neighborhood, and notes; saves to IndexedDB.
frontend/src/components/evidence/RealTim: Provides tabbed interface for capturing photo, audio, or video evidence in real-time using camera and media recorder hooks with preview and recording controls.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button component that handles Internet Identity authentication flow, displays loading states, and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossProfile: Form for entering and saving financial loss profile data including daily earnings, work days per week, deactivation date, and platform.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossProject: Displays a line chart projecting financial losses over 90 days based on the user's loss profile using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossReportA: Provides action buttons for downloading a PDF loss report and sharing a text summary of financial losses via native share or clipboard. Uses loss calculation utilities and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossResults: Displays three cards showing calculated weekly, monthly, and accumulated financial losses from a PublicLossProfile. Uses icons and destructive styling to emphasize loss amounts.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Market: Carousel banner component showcasing platform features (evidence tracking, loss calculator, resource generator, insights, security) with navigation controls and auto-advance. Navigates to plans page on click.
frontend/src/components/marketing/market: Defines the data structure and content for five marketing banner slides, each with headline, subheadline, and placeholder image paths for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/marketing/useMar: Custom hook managing carousel state with auto-advance timer, manual navigation (next/prev/goto), and pause/resume controls. Handles cleanup and timer resets.
frontend/src/components/payments/PagBank: Displays step-by-step instructions for configuring PagBank payment integration, including account creation, API credentials setup, webhook configuration, and SSL/HTTPS notices.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Shows an alert when a payment provider is not configured, with admin-specific actions to navigate to admin dashboard or user-facing messaging to contact administrators.
Displays payment flow status (pending, completed, failed) with appropriate UI, actions (retry, check status, navigate), and provider-specific messaging for Gateway or PagBank.
frontend/src/components/payments/PixQrCo: Displays a PIX QR code for payment with copy-to-clipboard functionality for both the PIX key and payload, includes loading, error handling, and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/payments/Transpa: Shows a checkout cart summary with selected subscription plan details, features, limitations, and a payment button for card transactions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup, collecting name (required), email, platform, region, and phone. Shows automatically when user profile is null after authentication.
frontend/src/components/sessions/WorkSes: Provides controls to start/end work sessions with city selection and automatically fetches weather samples every 30 minutes during active sessions.
Displays a list of all work sessions with start/end times, duration, city, and weather sample counts, highlighting active sessions.
Container component that combines WorkSessionControls and WorkSessionsList, managing the active session state.
frontend/src/components/subscription/Fea: Guards features based on subscription entitlement, showing upgrade prompts for expired or insufficient subscriptions with navigation to plans page.
frontend/src/components/subscription/Pla: Displays a comparison matrix of subscription plans with features, pricing, and selection buttons, supporting both mobile card and desktop table views.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Sub: Dialog component for submitting testimonials with form validation, authentication check via Internet Identity, and success/error handling. Includes character limits and Portuguese UI text.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/tes: Defines the Testimonial interface and exports static testimonial data for delivery workers from various platforms (iFood, Uber, Rappi, 99).
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Tes: Displays approved testimonials in a grid layout with loading skeletons, falling back to static data if no backend testimonials exist. Includes a submit testimonial dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/trust/TrustBadge: Displays three trust badges (Data Protection, Secure Payment, 100% Trustworthy) with icons in a horizontal flex layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance, handling authentication state and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin hooks for user access management (get all users, block/unblock), but backend methods are not yet implemented and throw errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPaymentConfig: Mutation hook for updating payment configuration with error sanitization to prevent exposing sensitive backend data. No query method for security reasons.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppeals.ts: Provides hooks for generating and retrieving appeals with evidence, but all backend methods are not yet implemented and throw errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlockedAccountHelp: Manages local storage-based progress tracking for blocked account help flow, including steps, checklist items, and completion state per user principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useCases.ts: Provides CRUD operations for cases using local storage (casesStorage), including creating cases, attaching evidence/appeals, and querying by ID or all cases.
Hooks for submitting and retrieving collective reports by platform/region, but backend methods are not implemented and return empty arrays or throw errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides current user authentication state including principal ID, short ID, and logout function by wrapping the Internet Identity hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvidence.ts: Defines React Query hooks for evidence management (get, upload, delete) with filters for timeline, but all backend methods are unimplemented and evidence is stored in IndexedDB client-side.
frontend/src/hooks/useGatewayPayment.ts: Manages generic payment gateway flow state (idle, initiating, pending, completed, failed) with mutations for creating sessions and checking status, but backend methods are not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomepageStyleVaria: Manages homepage style variant selection (A, B, or C) with localStorage persistence and a toggle function to cycle through variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and provider component with login, logout, and identity state management using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries the backend to check if the current caller has admin privileges using the isCallerAdmin actor method.
frontend/src/hooks/useLossProfile.ts: Provides hooks to get and set user loss profiles, though the get method is not yet implemented in the backend and returns null.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaRecorder.ts: Custom hook for audio/video recording using MediaRecorder API with start, stop, pause, resume, and cancel controls plus duration tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMercadoPagoPayment: Empty file, no implementation for MercadoPago payment integration.
frontend/src/hooks/usePagBankPayment.ts: Manages PagBank payment flow with session creation and status checking mutations, including redirect to checkout URL, but backend methods are not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/usePagBankReturnWebho: Provides hooks to get and set PagBank return and webhook URL configuration via backend actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/usePagBankTransparent: Provides hooks to get and set PagBank transparent checkout configuration via backend actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicPaymentConfi: Fetches public (non-sensitive) payment provider configuration from the backend with caching and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a hook to fetch 'reviso motivada' message, but the backend method is not implemented and returns a placeholder string.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscription.ts: Provides React hooks for fetching subscription status and evaluating user entitlements, with a placeholder returning a default free plan since backend methods are not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestimonials.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching approved/pending testimonials, submitting new testimonials, and updating testimonial status (admin only), with error sanitization and query invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile using React Query, with automatic cache invalidation after profile updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useWorkSessions.ts: Defines React Query hooks for logging work sessions, ending sessions, adding weather samples, and fetching session data; most backend methods are not yet implemented and throw errors or return empty data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables optimized for a driver-focused dark-mode-first design, including warm orange primary, deep navy secondary, and style variants for teal and coral emphasis.
frontend/src/lib/canisterConfig.ts: Exports functions to retrieve the backend canister ID from environment variables or window location and generate a webhook URL for PagBank integration.
frontend/src/lib/casesStorage.ts: Implements localStorage-based CRUD operations for managing user cases, including creating cases, attaching evidence/appeals, updating status, and maintaining timeline events.
frontend/src/lib/collectiveOptions.ts: Defines region options (Fortaleza, Caucaia, Maracana√∫) and provides a function to retrieve neighborhoods for each region.
frontend/src/lib/evidenceIndexedDb.ts: Manages IndexedDB storage for evidence media (images, audio, video) and metadata, providing async functions and React hooks to store and retrieve evidence with automatic object URL management.
frontend/src/lib/lossCalculations.ts: Provides utility functions to calculate weekly, monthly, accumulated, and projected financial losses based on a driver's public loss profile and deactivation date.
frontend/src/lib/mailto.ts: Generates mailto links for platform-specific appeal emails and support emails with pre-filled subject and body parameters.
Manages selected subscription plan state in sessionStorage during checkout flow with save, get, and clear functions.
frontend/src/lib/payments/gatewayErrorMe: Sanitizes generic gateway payment errors into user-friendly Portuguese messages, categorizing them by type (provider disabled, authentication failed, payment declined, etc.) and indicating whether they require admin action or are user errors.
frontend/src/lib/payments/pagbankErrorMe: Sanitizes PagBank-specific payment errors into user-friendly Portuguese messages, handling provider configuration issues, authentication failures, payment declines, and webhook validation errors with appropriate user/admin action flags.
frontend/src/lib/payments/paymentErrorMe: Centralized payment error sanitizer that maps backend errors to safe English user-facing messages, categorizing errors by type and providing admin-specific guidance for configuration issues.
frontend/src/lib/payments/pixPayload.ts: Generates valid PIX EMV QR code payloads following BR Code specification, including CRC16 checksum calculation and TLV formatting for static PIX payments with configurable merchant details and transaction amounts.
frontend/src/lib/payments/providerConfig: Manages payment provider selection (gateway/pagbank) in localStorage and determines the active provider from public config, prioritizing PagBank over Gateway when both are enabled.
frontend/src/lib/payments/qrCodeGenerato: Dynamically loads the qrcode library from CDN and generates QR code data URLs from text with configurable size and high error correction level.
frontend/src/lib/pdfReport.ts: Generates PDF loss reports using jsPDF loaded from CDN, displaying profile information and calculated financial losses (weekly, monthly, accumulated) with formatted boxes and styling.
frontend/src/lib/subscriptions/plans.ts: Defines subscription plan configurations (free_24h, pro_monthly, pro_annual) with pricing, features, defense limits, and provides a helper function to retrieve plans by ID.
frontend/src/lib/subscriptions/rules.ts: Defines subscription entitlement logic, evaluating user subscription status (trial, pro, expired) and formatting expiry dates in Portuguese.
frontend/src/lib/supportSummary.ts: Generates formatted case summaries and creates mailto links with case details for support emails.
frontend/src/lib/templatesLibrary.ts: Provides a library of appeal and communication templates for different platforms (iFood, Uber) and categories (appeals, rights, evidence).
frontend/src/lib/testimonials/testimonia: Sanitizes testimonial mutation errors into user-friendly English messages, handling auth, admin, and not-found cases.
frontend/src/lib/weatherClient.ts: Fetches weather data from OpenWeatherMap API for Brazilian cities, mapping conditions to backend enum types with fallback defaults.
frontend/src/lib/zipExport.ts: Placeholder function for exporting evidence files as a ZIP archive; currently logs evidence IDs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard for managing users (block/unblock), payment configuration (Gateway/PagBank), and testimonial moderation with tabs and forms.
frontend/src/pages/AppealGeneratorPage.t: Page for generating appeal letters using a wizard, evidence picker, and download/email functionality with optional case linking.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that handles payment initiation and status checking for both Gateway and PagBank providers, displaying QR codes or transparent checkout forms.
frontend/src/pages/CollectiveInsightsPag: Displays aggregated anonymous community data about delivery worker deactivations with filters for platform, region, and reason, showing distribution charts and trends.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page showing module cards (Evidence Tracker, Loss Calculator, Resource Generator, Collective Data) and quick access buttons for Payments, Profile, and Quick Lookup.
frontend/src/pages/DataPolicyPage.tsx: Displays the LGPD-compliant data policy explaining how personal data, work data, financial data, and evidence are collected, processed, and protected.
frontend/src/pages/EvidenceDetailPage.ts: Shows detailed view of a single evidence item (selfie, screenshot, audio, or video) with metadata like platform, region, and upload time, loading media from IndexedDB.
frontend/src/pages/EvidenceTrackerPage.t: Tabbed page with authentication gate allowing users to upload and view evidence timeline and manage work sessions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showcasing the platform's four main features, benefits, and plan comparison matrix with hero section and call-to-action for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/LossCalculatorPage.ts: Authenticated page for calculating financial losses from deactivation, displaying results cards, projection chart, and PDF export actions based on user's loss profile.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Displays available payment methods (PIX, Credit Card, Bank Slip) with icons and descriptions, includes a CTA to view plans and trust badges.
frontend/src/pages/PlansBillingPage.tsx: Shows subscription plans with pricing, features, and upgrade options; displays current subscription status and entitlement information with trust badges.
frontend/src/pages/PlansDashboardPage.ts: Dashboard for managing user's current subscription with status details, expiry dates, and plan comparison grid with upgrade functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays comprehensive privacy policy in Portuguese covering data collection, usage, storage, security, sharing practices, and user rights in a scrollable card.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile management form allowing users to update personal information including name, email, platform, region, and phone number with validation.
frontend/src/pages/PublicOverviewPage.ts: Marketing landing page showcasing app features (evidence tracker, loss calculator, resource generator, collective data) with hero section, testimonials, plan comparison, and A/B/C style variants.
frontend/src/pages/QuickAccessPage.tsx: Page component that displays platform cards (Uber, 99, iFood) with deep-link functionality to open mobile apps or fallback to web URLs; requires authentication and redirects unauthenticated users to home.
frontend/src/pages/QuickProcessLookupPag: Placeholder page for future process/appeal lookup functionality with a search form and informational alerts about upcoming features like real-time status tracking and notifications.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Extended TypeScript type definitions for backend entities (Evidence, Appeal, CollectiveReport, Subscription, Testimonial, Payment, Case) that are missing from the generated backend interface but needed in the frontend.
frontend/src/types/case.ts: TypeScript interfaces defining the Case entity structure including evidence attachments, appeals, timeline events, status types, and creation parameters for managing driver deactivation cases.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: TypeScript declaration file extending the Window interface to include the jsPDF library loaded via CDN.
frontend/src/types/qrcode.d.ts: TypeScript declaration file extending the Window interface to include the QRCode library with methods for generating QR codes as data URLs, canvas, or strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, Outfit/Inter font families, container queries, typography plugin, and comprehensive color palette for UI components including dark mode support.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking implemented features (financial loss calculator, PDF export, dark mode) and pending feature requests for the Rotas e Direitos driver assistance application.
